授業目的: This course provides students with a unique opportunity to learn about Japanese companies' use of management resources to generate innovation value, by focusing on the unique characteristics of Japanese markets, and Japanese culture and social issues. The course is conducted by lecture, and by interactive discussion among the students, and is based on business case studies of major companies and mid-small companies.
到達目標:
Students are expected to:
1. Familiarize themselves with innovation approaches adopted by established Japanese companies.
2. Focus their understanding on the specifics of Japanese companies’ marketing and business strategies that optimize their organizational and management resources.
3. Encourage themselves to be future business leaders at the established Japanese companies.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】総合日本学習科目（日本企業におけるイノベーション）（CIEC）/Innovation and Intrapreneurship（国際学部）
授業方法:
Face to face format lecture followed by the class discussions based on business cases.
Students are expected to participate to the class discussions actively.

第1回: Introduction; In this session, introduction of lecturer, objectives and targets of the course and expected developing skills by taking this course are explained by the lecturer.
第2回: Characteristics of Japanese Company; In this session, the history of modern Japanese economy and industry development related to the characteristic of Japanese company are explained, followed by the interactive session among the participants.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第3回: Business Framework; Business philosophy, management resources, company as a going concern, and marketing strategy are explained as a basic of business administration.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第4回: Guest Speaker Session; In this session, as a practical example of characteristics of Japanese company, the guest speaker talks about the business philosophy, goals and day-to-day activities.Interactive discussions are expected in Q$A session.
Read assigned materials and prepare for Q&A session, and review the lecture of the gusest speaker for deeper understandings.
第5回: Business Case #1; As a case of creating the new value by utilizing accumulated business resources, the development story of Fuji Film Instax Camera and the related backgrounds are explained.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第6回: Discussion on Business Case #1; Based on the development story of business case #1, interactive discussion will be conducted to find the key factors for success, the alternative business strategies, and the other backgrounds.
Read assigned materials, prepare for class discussion and review the contents for deeper understandings.
第7回: Business Case #2; As a case of developing potential customers by providing unprecedented customers” satisfaction, the development story of Nintendo DS, Wii and the related backgrounds are explained.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第8回: Discussion on Business Case #2; Based on the development story of business case #2, interactive discussion will be conducted to find the key factors for success, the alternative business strategies, and the other backgrounds.
Read assigned materials, prepare for class discussion and review the contents for deeper understandings.
第9回: Business Case #3; As a case of creating the added value of the products by listening to the lead users’ voice, the development story of Panasonic Beauty products and the related backgrounds are explained.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第10回: Discussion on Business Case #3; Based on the development story of business case #3, interactive discussion will be conducted to find the key factors for success, the alternative business strategies, and the other backgrounds.
Read assigned materials, prepare for class discussion and review the contents for deeper understandings.
第11回: Business Case #4; As a case of differentiating the position among the competing companies, the product development story of Vacuum Cleaner manufacturer (Dyson, Panasonic and Iris Oyama) are explained.
Read assigned materials and prepare for class discussion
第12回: Discussion on Business Case #4; Based on the development story of business case #4, interactive discussion will be conducted to find the key factors for success, the alternative business strategies, and the other backgrounds.
Read assigned materials, prepare for class discussion and review the contents for deeper understandings.
第13回: Business Case #5; As a case of autonomous management and social innovation by the local based company, the management stories of Sato Seiki Co., Ltd (Himeji city, Hyogo) are explained, followed by Q&A session with the CEO.
Read assigned materials, prepare for class discussion and review the contents for deeper understandings.
第14回: Summary; As a summary of this course, innovative approaches and the key factors for success of business cases are reviewed through interactive discussion.
Read assigned materials and review your study through the course.
